programme.title: Land Of The Bears
programme.desc: Set in the wilderness of the Kamchatka Peninsula, the land of legends and the kingdom of wild brown bears, we follow the daily adventures of five wild brown bears.

programme.title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
programme.desc: After a freak accident, an invisible yuppie runs for his life from a treacherous CIA official while trying to cope with his new life.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is recruited by the Vatican to investigate the apparent return of the Illuminati - a secret, underground organization - after four cardinals are kidnapped on the night of the papal conclave.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Wrongfully accused of murdering his wife, Richard Kimble escapes from the law in an attempt to find her killer and clear his name. Pursuing him is a team of U.S. marshals led by Deputy Samuel Gerard, a determined detective who will not rest until Richard is captured. As Richard leads the team through a series of intricate chases, he discovers the secrets behind his wife's death and struggles to expose the killer before it is too late.

programme.title: Giallo
programme.desc: In Italy, a woman fears her sister has been kidnapped; Inspector Enzo Avolfi fears it's worse. They team up to rescue her from a sadistic killer known only as Yellow.

programme.title: The Company You Keep
programme.desc: A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who discovers his identity.

programme.title: Side Effects
programme.desc: A woman turns to prescription medication as a way of handling her anxiety concerning her husband's upcoming release from prison.

programme.title: Man on fire
programme.desc: Jaded ex-CIA operative John Creasy reluctantly accepts a job as the bodyguard for a 10-year-old girl in Mexico City. They clash at first, but eventually bond, and when she's kidnapped he's consumed by fury and will stop at nothing to save her life.

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: The story of the awakening of painter, Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.

programme.title: The Big Short
programme.desc: The men who made millions from a global economic meltdown.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: Three young houseflies stow away aboard the Apollo 11 flight to the moon.

programme.title: Boychoir
programme.desc: A troubled and angry 11-year-old orphan from a small Texas town, ends up at a Boy Choir school after the death of his single mother. Completely out of his element, he finds himself in a battle of wills with a demanding Choir Master who recognises a unique talent in this young boy as he pushes him to discover his creative heart and soul in music.

programme.title: Stars!
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: Giallo
programme.desc: In Italy, a woman fears her sister has been kidnapped; Inspector Enzo Avolfi fears it's worse. They team up to rescue her from a sadistic killer known only as Yellow.

programme.title: Casino Jack
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a hot shot Washington DC lobbyist and his protg go down hard as their schemes to peddle influence lead to corruption and murder.

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Billy "The Great" Hope, the reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, has an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter, and a lavish lifestyle. However, when tragedy strikes, Billy hits rock bottom, losing his family, his house and his manager. He soon finds an unlikely savior in Tick Willis, a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, Hope fights to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time... In Hollywood
programme.desc: Los Angeles, 1969. TV star Rick Dalton, a struggling actor specializing in westerns, and stuntman Cliff Booth, his best friend, try to survive in a constantly changing movie industry. Dalton is the neighbor of the young and promising actress and model Sharon Tate, who has just married the prestigious Polish director Roman Polanski.

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The story of Oakland Athletics general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to put together a baseball team on a budget, by employing computer-generated analysis to draft his players.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.

programme.title: Guilty by Suspicion
programme.desc: This compelling story vividly recreates Hollywood's infamous 'Blacklist Era'. The witch-hunt has begun and director David Merrill can revive his stalled career by testifying against friends who are suspected communists. Merrill's ex wife shares a whirlpool of scandals that draws them closer together while his chances for ever making movies again slips further away...

programme.title: The Frozen Ground
programme.desc: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: A brother and sister return to their family home in search of their world famous parents who have disappeared.

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Maria Altmann, an octogenarian Jewish refugee, takes on the Austrian government to recover a world famous painting of her aunt plundered by the Nazis during World War II, she believes rightfully belongs to her family. She did so not just to regain what was rightfully hers, but also to obtain some measure of justice for the death, destruction, and massive art theft perpetrated by the Nazis.

programme.title: Land Of The Bears
programme.desc: Set in the wilderness of the Kamchatka Peninsula, the land of legends and the kingdom of wild brown bears, we follow the daily adventures of five wild brown bears.

programme.title: Stars!
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: Superfast!
